structure.unit: DIVISION 3. SIGN STANDARDS REQUIREMENTS AND CHARTS

law.catch_line: Permanent point of sale signs for the RU-5 and RU-5A Districts.

text.section:
Sec. 33-104. Permanent point of sale signs for the RU-5 and RU-5A Districts.
Type of sign permitted: Only flat (wall or cantilever) sign.
